OK, this is daft.  Linux is just a version of UNIX, and is ok given its free, but remember it has a debugging dept of several millions.. lol  It should be bloody perfect, yet isn't!

Flash stuff, stolen from MAC?  No.  Both Microsoft and Apple stole the graphical interface from Xerox and their PARC research center around the same time.

Get a grip.  Microsoft really pioneered personal computers and became succesful although I agree their software is bloated and over complex.  I really hate Vista over its complexity but it is aiming itself at users not experts.

MacOS is now based on UNIX as is Linux, but Apple just as big a corporate company and very over priced as they always were. 

jeez at least get your history right people...
